description: This notification is sent when the configuration is saved.
This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: The date and time of the most recent running configuration save.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastSaved

description: The date and time of the most recent running configuration change.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastChanged

description: This notification is sent when the configuration on the device changes.
A hysteresis mechanism is evaluated before sending in an effort to limit the
number of events generated. This mechanism will send out one notification
when an accumulation rate threshold is crossed. If the context/user/origin
of a configuration change does not match the currently tracked
context/user/origin, then this notification will automatically be sent.
The hysteresis algorithm will then be evaluated based on the new

event.Summary: Configuration changed by user $v3 from $v4 at $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 8 CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastContext i 1 CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastUser s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastOrigin s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastChanged x 07cc09010F1E00002b011E

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: The last context that modified the configuration state.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastContext

description: The last user that modified the configuration state.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastUser

description: The last origin that modified the configuration state such as
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastOrigin

description: The date and time of the most recent running configuration change.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CONFIG-MGMT-MIB::cienaCesConfigMgmtConfigLastChanged
